text.div:
TimeOfDay Logical Model

Time of day the event should take place on the designated day(s). TimeOfDay should only be specified if the RecurrenceInterval and/or DayOfWeek establishes the day when the event should take place.

name: TimeOfDay
title: shr-core-TimeOfDay
description:
Time of day the event should take place on the designated day(s).
TimeOfDay should only be specified if the RecurrenceInterval and/or DayOfWeek establishes the day when the event should take place.
